text: thawa duratath meki sangam walatath mudal sewimata awashya nam thana thana mal wikunannan polisiya bharayata path kala yuthuya.

samahara demapiyan daruwange lokayen me widiyata sadahata samugena yanawa.ee wagema thamayi samahara demapiyan daruwange sapatha sathuta wenuwenma eyalagen duras wela desa dipankare gihin mudal hambakaranawa.derataka thaniwechcha ee mawpiyange , ee daruwange hith wala mona tharam gindarak awilenawa adda..?aduma tharame sinhala awuruddakatawath eka mese wadi wela ekata kiribath kallak kanna tharamwath waram nathuwa hullana ee aathma koyi tharamnam hithin walapenawa adda...?eeth eyala yam tharamakata hari wasanawanthayi.

chat sajiwi wikashaya sandaha nidahas ha liyapadinchi thorawa "mage chat" widiyo chat saha margagatha aalaya sewa chat sajiwi wikashaya sandaha nidahas ha liyapadinchi thorawa «mage chat» widiyo chat saha margagatha aalaya sewa pariganaka, sanniwedana mewalamak sandaha guwan widuli jiwath wana saha wartha rupawahini wadasatahan, chithrapata, krida, katun, saha aadhunika widiyo alla kamarawa samaga.
